title: New: Vaults – Cry No More
body:
This is a little bit special.

Sweeping synth sections, perfectly pitched female vocals that everyone is a sucker for and a hook just ripe for the remixing. London’s **Vaults** are keeping it minimal for the moment with regards to information, which probably means that they have a decent team behind them (that’s how it works, right?). Their debut track, _Cry No More_, is one of those moments that’ll have you staring in the mirror, howling back each and every word to yourself, pretending that your reflection cares. Check it out below.
